summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2836 for the improvement of Thirty-first Avenue South, from the south margin of Jackson Street to the north margin of Norman Street on the west, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by paving and with asphalt and other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with brick or asphalt gutters, and such other work as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 34160, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
